member.name: CERT_CREDENTIAL_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_CREDENTIAL_INFO structure contains a reference to a certificate.

member.name: CERT_CREDENTIAL_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: Size of the structure in bytes. This member should be set tosizeof(CERT_CREDENTIAL_INFO). This structure might be a larger value in the future, indicating a newer version of the structure.

member.name: CERT_CREDENTIAL_INFO.rgbHashOfCert
member.summary: SHA-1 hash of the certificate referenced.
